title: The prologue and epilogue to the last new play, Constantine the Great
author: Otway, Thomas, 1652-1685.
notes: The prologue to Lee's Constantine the Great was written by T. Otway; the epilogue by Dryden. Cf. DNB.
Title on reel 724:32 lacks the initial article "The".
This item appears at reel 180:23 as Wing D2332A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 724:32 as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) O557.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
